nostrnip5-desc: Provides NIP-5 verification for MediaWiki users
nostrnip5-npub-help: Your Nostr public key in bech32 format (npub1...). This will be used for NIP-5 verification at /.well-known/nostr.json
nostrnip5-npub-invalid: Invalid npub format. Must start with 'npub1' followed by 58 characters.
